name: The Final Programme (C64) +Hack/Trainer
description:
The Final Programme (C64) Commodore 64

Original + New Hack/Trainer version ('The Final Package')

Warning: there are some expletives or profanity in game as well as a terrifying science-fiction horror theme, so please do not download if you get triggered or offended easily.

A game and story inspired partially by the 1960s & 1970s novel, graphic novel, and comic book hero Jerry Cornelius and The Final Programme.

Another new ksx game that includes both a mutation generator + game that includes randomized and customized elements, and which is the complex mathematical web that is... THE FINAL PROGRAMME. Create infinite new variants of mutations and try to escape from up to five notorious fictional laboratories.

SEE screenshots for

- color character graphic 'mutation' generator

- maze game where one must find the unlocked door, unlock and then either choose to escape by fully passing through the exit or wait, return to the maze and outwit or outmaneuver your opponent before they can inevitably capture you!
